Class SchedulingConstants

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.constants.SchedulingConstants
public final class SchedulingConstants extends Object
Task scheduling and queue management constants. Defines thresholds, scoring weights, and timing parameters for the task scheduling system.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    AFFINITY_ACCEPTABLE
    Acceptable affinity score.
    static final double
    AFFINITY_GOOD
    Good affinity score.
    static final double
    AFFINITY_MIN_THRESHOLD
    Minimum acceptable affinity score for task assignment.
    static final double
    AFFINITY_PERFECT
    Perfect affinity score.
    static final double
    AFFINITY_POOR
    Poor affinity score.
    static final Duration
    AGING_INTERVAL
    Interval at which task priorities are aged/boosted.
    static final int
    AGING_PRIORITY_BOOST
    Priority boost per aging cycle for waiting tasks.
    static final double
    CPU_OVERSUBSCRIPTION_LIMIT
    CPU oversubscription limit (ratio). 1.0 = no oversubscription, 2.0 = allow 2x oversubscription.
    static final Duration
    DEFAULT_TASK_TIMEOUT
    Default task execution timeout.
    static final int
    HEALTH_CHECK_FAILURE_THRESHOLD
    Number of failed health checks before marking worker unhealthy.
    static final Duration
    HEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL
    Interval between worker health checks.
    static final Duration
    HEALTH_CHECK_TIMEOUT
    Timeout for worker health check response.
    static final int
    MAX_AGING_BOOST
    Maximum priority boost from aging.
    static final int
    MAX_QUEUE_SIZE
    Maximum queue size before rejecting new tasks.
    static final Duration
    MAX_TASK_TIMEOUT
    Maximum task execution timeout.
    static final double
    MEMORY_OVERSUBSCRIPTION_LIMIT
    Memory oversubscription limit (ratio).
    static final double
    MIN_FREE_MEMORY_PERCENT
    Minimum free memory percentage to keep on worker.
    static final double
    QUEUE_CRITICAL_THRESHOLD
    Queue size critical threshold (percentage).
    static final double
    QUEUE_WARNING_THRESHOLD
    Queue size warning threshold (percentage).
    static final int
    STARVATION_PRIORITY_BOOST
    Priority boost for starving tasks.
    static final Duration
    STARVATION_THRESHOLD
    Time threshold after which a task is considered starving.
    static final Duration
    TIMEOUT_CHECK_INTERVAL
    Interval for checking task timeout.
    static final double
    WEIGHT_CPU
    Weight for CPU availability in scheduling score (0.0 - 1.0).
    static final double
    WEIGHT_DATA_LOCALITY
    Weight for data locality in scheduling score (0.0 - 1.0).
    static final double
    WEIGHT_GPU
    Weight for GPU availability in scheduling score (0.0 - 1.0).
    static final double
    WEIGHT_LABELS
    Weight for worker labels match in scheduling score (0.0 - 1.0).
    static final double
    WEIGHT_MEMORY
    Weight for memory availability in scheduling score (0.0 - 1.0).
